00038 function PrintBadwordsForm()
00039 {
00040     global $View, $Class;
00041     ?>
00042     <tr class="<?php echo $Class ?>">
00043         <td class="title">
00044             <?php echo _TITLE2('Badwords').':' ?>
00045         </td>
00046         <td>
00047             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00048                 <input style="display:none;" type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/>
00049                 <select name="BadwordsToDelete[]" multiple style="width: 200px; height: 200px;">
00050                     <?php
00051                     if ($View->Controller($output, 'GetBadwords')) {
00052                         foreach ($output as $badword) {
00053                             ?>
00054                             <option value="<?php echo $badword ?>"><?php echo $badword ?></option>
00055                             <?php
00056                         }
00057                     }
00058                     ?>
00059                 </select>
00060                 <input type="submit" name="Delete" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Delete') ?>"/><br />
00061                 <input type="text" name="BadwordToAdd" style="width: 200px;" maxlength="50"/>
00062                 <input type="submit" name="Add" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Add') ?>"/><br />
00063             </form>
00064         </td>
00065     </tr>
00066     <?php
00067 }
00068 
00069 if ($_POST['Delete']) {
00070     foreach ($_POST['BadwordsToDelete'] as $Badword) {
00071         $View->Controller($Output, 'DelBadword', $Badword);
00072     }
00073 }
00074 else if ($_POST['Add'] && $_POST['BadwordToAdd']) {
00075     $View->Controller($Output, 'AddBadword', $_POST['BadwordToAdd']);
00076 }
00077 
00078 $CustomFunc= 'PrintBadwordsForm';
00079 require_once('../lib/conf.php');
00080 ?>
